Юридическая информация: LEGAL: Grand Capital is a brand name owned and operated by Grand Capital Ltd. (Reg. no. 036046), a member of FinCom, an international regulatory body for financial markets. Grand Capital Ltd. is located at 106 Premier Building Victoria, Mahe, Seychelles. Email at: info@grandcapital.net
RAMM (Risk Allocation & Money Management: RAMM (Risk Allocation & Money Management) is a secure investment service that allows to get profit on financial markets by following trading strategies of experienced traders.
Основные приоритеты RAMM – это:: The main priorities of RAMM are:
Защита капитала от непредсказуемых паден: Protection of capital from sudden and unpredictable losses
Высокая точность копирования стратегий: High accuracy of copying of trading strategies
Сервис подходит как для опытных инвестор: The service is suitable for experienced investors as well as for those just starting their acquaintance with financial markets. No special knowledge is required to use the service — RAMM will protect you from complexity of the finance world, leaving only the most important for your attention.
Опытным трейдерам сервис предоставляет н: For experienced traders RAMM offers possibility to receive fee for sharing their strategies to investors all over the world.
Моментальный ввод и вывод средств: Instant investing and withdrawing of money
Защите инвестиций в RAMM уделено особое: Special attention is paid to the capital protection in RAMM:
При инвестировании средства остаются на: All invested money are kept on your personal account, and no one except you can withdraw them. All trading activity on your account is under your full control.
Ваш счет защищен от непредсказуемых паде: Each strategy in RAMM is protected from unexpected losses. The “Capital protection” attribute of an investment shows the percent of invested capital that cannot be lost.
Например, защита капитала, равная 80% оз: For example, capital protection equal to 80% means that once the investment loses 20% of funds, all positions will be automatically closed. After that new positions will not be copied until you decide whether you wish to continue copying or not.
Защита капитала ограничивает риски, но н: The protection of capital limits the risks, but not the yield. You can get a return that exceeds your risk by several times. Therefore, RAMM adheres to the well-known rule of investing: “Risk less to get more!”.
В RAMM вы платите вознаграждение за испо:
When investing in strategies in RAMM, you pay fee to the trader, owner of the strategy. You pay when you get net profit. Additionally, traders can set up turnover-based fee for their strategies, that will be paid at the moment of copying a trade.
The fee structure of a particular strategy is given on its Strategy Details page.
В RAMM вы можете ввести и вывести средст: In RAMM you can deposit or withdraw your money instantly at any moment (during the market trading session). All current positions will be opened or closed in your investment by current market prices. Adding or closing of a single investment doesn’t anyhow affect the results of other investors in the same strategy.
Открытие счета RAMM осуществляется из кл: To open a RAMM account, first go to your broker’s cabinet.
На странице открытия торгового счета выб: On the account opening page, choose the account of type "RAMM".
Далее необходимо задать пароль, который: To login to the RAMM platform use your email (to which your broker’s cabinet is registered) and the chosen password.
Каждый клиент брокера может открыть толь: You can open only one RAMM account. Using it, you can create or invest into unlimited number of strategies.
Для ввода и вывода средств используйте к: To deposit to a RAMM-account or withdraw funds from it use your broker’s cabinet. You can use any supported payment methods.
Обратите внимание, что для вывода с RAMM: Please note that you can withdraw from your RAMM-account only those funds, which are not involved in strategies as investments.
Вы можете проинвестировать в ТОП-5 лучши: You can invest into TOP-5 best
При инвестировании в стратегию в RAMM со: When you create an investment into a strategy, RAMM creates a special sub-account for you, dedicated to copying signals only from this strategy. This sub-account is called investment. The chosen amount is transferred from your account to the Investment. No one except you has access to the Investment. Investments in different strategies use different sub-accounts, so different strategies don’t affect each other.
При инвестировании нужно указать сумму и: To invest, you need to define the amount you want to invest and other parameters from the
Копирование начнется сразу же после попо: The copying will start immediately after investing. The open positions which will be present in the RAMM strategy by this moment, will be opened in your investments with current market prices. This way you can choose an optimal moment to start investing.
Платформа RAMM автоматически подберет об: RAMM platform will choose position volume proportionally to the size of your investment. The more funds you invest, the better accuracy can be achieved. However, even the smallest investments are guaranteed to get at least a minimal volume allowed by the broker.
При создании инвестиции пользователю пре: While creating a new investment a client has to enter a number of parameters: Factor, Target and Protection. This set of parameters as a whole is called an “investment profile”. During the first investing operation, the predefined values are initially chosen with possibility of manual change. This changed values are memorized by the platform and used for setting the next investment.
Фактор - повышающий/понижающий коэффицие: Factor - copy multiplication coefficient, changes from 0.1 to 10. I.e. Factor = 2 means we are going to copy positions with potential profit (and risk) two times higher than on the original strategy.
Цель - целевая доходность инвестиции. Пр: Target - investment profit target. If this target is reached, all trading is suspended until investor confirms that he wants to continue trading. In this case, a new target is set.
Защита - защитный порог инвестиции. Озна: Protection - investment protection level. It defines how much of your investment you don’t want to put at risk in case of losses. If this level is reached, all trading is suspended until investor confirms that he wants to continue trading. In this case, a new protection level is set.
Частичное снятие средств с Вашей инвести: You can withdraw part of funds from your investment any time, after your investments is switched to “Pause” mode using the investment context menu. In this mode copying of positions will be temporarily stopped until “Pause” mode is turned off. Funds will be transferred to your account instantly.
Обратите внимание, что для частичного сн: Please note that after withdrawing money from an investment, its balance should be not less than the minimal investment balance, defined in the
Для полного снятия средств в любое время: To withdraw all your funds at any time, you can
Вы можете пополнить каждую из ваших инве: You can fund any of your investments at any time. Funds are transferred from your RAMM account into the investment instantly.
Если в момент пополнения имелись открыты: If by the moment of funding there were open positions in the investment, their volume will be increased proportionally to the new investment balance. This increase will be performed according to current market prices. This way the profitability of investment and its RAMM strategy will remain equal.
Для частичного вывода средств из инвести: To withdraw part of funds from your investment, first you have to switch investment to Pause mode.
Установить “Паузу” можно в кабинете, на: You can set Pause mode from “Investments” page of your cabinet by pressing a button with corresponding icon. Pressing the same button again will resume trading on the investment.
В режиме “Пауза” копирование сделок врем: In Pause mode trading is temporarily disabled and all open positions are closed. When trading is resumed, all open positions from the RAMM strategy are reopened in the investment with current market prices.
Вознаграждение от прибыли — это часть от: The fee is calculated individually for each invstor.
Расчет вознаграждения производится с уче: Investor’s profit is calculated taking the high water mark into account: if the current profit (since the creation of the investment) is less than its maximal profit (i.e. it’s a drawdown), the fee will be paid only since the profit exceeds its historical maximal value.
Расчет и выплата Вознаграждения от прибы: The performance fee is calculated and paid at the end of each week or when you
Вы можете закрыть инвестицию в любой мом: You can close any of your investments at any time. When an investment is being closed, all its open positions are closed by the current market prices.
, после чего средства инвестиции перевод: is calculated and paid. After that, the money is transferred from your investment to your RAMM account.
Если Вы подаете команду закрытия инвести: Investment equity you see in RAMM is calculated based on the indicative quotes received when you refresh the page. Hence, the exact amount of money you will get after you close an investment may slightly differ from what you have seen when clicking the ‘Close’ button.
Закрытие активных позиций инвестиции про: You cannot restore a closed investment, but you can create a new investment into the same strategy.

На одном счете RAMM может быть открыто н: You can create unlimited number of strategies using one RAMM account. Each strategy is traded on a dedicated sub-account and doesn’t affect other strategies. При закрытии стратегии, все инвестиции в: When a strategy is being closed, all its investments are closed, the trader’s fee is calculated and paid by the investors, then your investment into this strategy is closed and the money are transferred to your RAMM account.
Если в этот момент в стратегии были откр: If a strategy has some open positions at this time, all of them will be automatically closed using market orders.

Появление новых инвестиций в вашей страт: New investments into your strategy don’t require any changes in trading from you. You can continue trading as you did before, while getting additional profit from your investors.

Where can I copy signals from?
В качестве счета-источника сигналов можн: You can copy signals from any real or demo account, opened in MetaTrader 4 or MetaTrader 5.
При запуске советника происходит первичн: When you put the EA on some chart, the initial synchronization of open positions occurs. Later, the EA sends a signal to the RAMM server once it detects new position or change of any of existing positions. Only market orders are copied. If you use pending orders, they will be sent to the strategy only when they fire and change into market orders (positions).
Что будет, если на момент запуска копиро: What happens if there are open positions by the moment I launch the EA?
Произойдет синхронизация, и все позиции: The synchronization will occur and all open positions will be copied to your strategy. They will be opened in RAMM by the current market prices (see some exceptions below).
Что такое “синхронизация” и зачем она ну: What is a “synchronization” and what do we need it for?
Иногда недостаточно посылать сигналы тол: Sometimes it’s not enough to send signals only when positions are opened or closed, since the leverage ratio could change due to deposits or withdrawals. Moreover, the EA could be temporarily disabled due to electricity or network problems. To address the situation, we have a special “synchronization” command, which sends volumes of all currently opened positions in one package. Upon receiving this command, RAMM server ensures its list of open positions is exactly the same, by opening and closing positions if needed. Synchronization is automatically sent when EA is restarted, when new deposit or withdrawal is detected, and also after releasing strategy from “
В каких пропорциях происходит копировани: What are the volumes of copied positions?
Перед отправкой команды на открытие ново: Before sending a new position to your strategy, the EA calculates the ratio between the volume of the source position and the equity of your account. The volume of the position to be opened in your strategy in RAMM will be calculated using this ratio. If there is already an open position for the instrument, then RAMM volume is calculated acсording to ratio between old and new position volume on the source account.
Таким образом, в какой бы валюте ни был: So, no matter what the currency or equity of your MetaTrader account is, your trading will be copied correctly. If calculations show that the volume to be opened is lesser than minimum possible volume, RAMM will open exactly one minimal lot. This way your investment will work even if there is not enough funds.
Платформа RAMM работает с собственным сп: RAMM supports only certain instruments. The EA automatically detects the most widely spread postfixes in the instrument names, so, for instance, a position with symbol “EURUSD.e” will be copied correctly as “EURUSD”.
Однако если инструмента нет в списке, ли: If some instruments, available in your MetaTrader terminal, are not available in RAMM, or have some non-standard postfixes, positions with these instruments won’t be copied to your strategy.
Можно ли копировать позиции с одного сче: Is it possible to copy positions from one MetaTrader account to several strategies?
Да, можно. Каждой стратегии RAMM будет с: Yes, it’s possible. You will need to download dedicated EAs for each of your strategies and run them in different chart windows of your MetaTrader terminal.
Можно ли копировать сигналы с разных сче: Is it possible to copy signals from several MetaTrader accounts to one strategy?
Нет, нельзя. Дело в том, что каждый из с: This is not recommended. Though possible technically, each time some of the EAs runs the synchronization, all positions in the strategy, coming from another MetaTrader account, will be closed.
Как мне узнать, скопировались ли мои поз: How do I know if a position was copied?
Текущее состояние позиций, открытых в ва: You can use statement of your investment. You can find it in the strategy context menu on
Что будет, если на счете-источнике испол: What if I close positions partially on MT source account? How RAMM will react to this?
Поскольку платформа RAMM основана на нет: Since RAMM utilizes netting system, each signal sent from MT account contains information about total volume of positions opened for the instrument. This way partial closure doesn’t differ from any other type of signal, and will be processed correctly. As soon as signal EA detects partial closing, it sends a signal into RAMM platform with new total volume for this instrument. RAMM compares this new volume with currently opened and then calculates and closes the difference.
Максимальное плечо, доступное для копиро: Maximum leverage available for RAMM strategies is shown on your broker’s website.
При получении сигнала с фактическим плеч: If RAMM receives a signal with leverage greater than this value, it will open position with maximum possible volume, according to actual free margin.
RAMM оперирует понятиями “ордер”, “сделк: RAMM in its operations uses terms “order, “deal” and “position”.
Ордер - это приказ о покупке или продаже: An Order is an instruction to buy or sell a financial instrument.
Сделка - фиксация факта покупки или прод: A Deal states the fact of buying or selling of an instrument with actual price and volume.
Позиция - суммарный объем купленного, ли: A Position shows current volume of bought or sold instrument in total.
Платформа RAMM основана на неттинге. В о: RAMM platform is based on netting principles. It can have only one open position for each trading instrument at the any given time.
RAMM поддерживает стандартные Market орд: RAMM supports the usual set of Market order types:
После исполнения рыночного ордера его об: When a market order is executed, depending on its direction, its volume is added to or subtracted from current open position for the instrument, and a record about this operation (i.e. a deal) is added to investment statement.
Сделки бывают следующих типов:: There are three types of a deal:
InOut (выход из позиции с переворотом, т: InOut (reverse position, i.e. decrease volume to zero and then enter new position in the opposite direction)

в таблицу “Разрешить WebRequest для след: to table “Allow WebRequest for listed URL:”.

При создании стратегии вы должны создать: A strategy requires your investment into it. This investment can be closed only together with the strategy.
Вы можете инвестировать только свободные: You can invest only free funds.
Полное закрытие инвестиции в вашу собств: You can close an investment into your strategy only by closing the strategy itself. Please note that this action is irreversible.
Вы можете закрыть вашу инвестицию в любо: You can close your investment at any moment. Later you will be able to create a new investment into the same strategy. Note that after closing the investment drawdown will become 0.
Средства вашей инвестиции рассчитаны по: Current equity of your investment is calculated by indicative quotes. When your investment is closed, all open positions will be closed by current market quotes, that can slightly differ from the indicative.
